005package edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.util.Units;
008
009/** Holds the constants for a DC motor. */
010public class DCMotor {
011  public final double nominalVoltageVolts;
012  public final double stallTorqueNewtonMeters;
013  public final double stallCurrentAmps;
014  public final double freeCurrentAmps;
015  public final double freeSpeedRadPerSec;
016  public final double rOhms;
017  public final double KvRadPerSecPerVolt;
018  public final double KtNMPerAmp;
019
020  /**
021   * Constructs a DC motor.
022   *
023   * @param nominalVoltageVolts Voltage at which the motor constants were measured.
024   * @param stallTorqueNewtonMeters Current draw when stalled.
025   * @param stallCurrentAmps Current draw when stalled.
026   * @param freeCurrentAmps Current draw under no load.
027   * @param freeSpeedRadPerSec Angular velocity under no load.
028   * @param numMotors Number of motors in a gearbox.
029   */
030  public DCMotor(
031      double nominalVoltageVolts,
032      double stallTorqueNewtonMeters,
033      double stallCurrentAmps,
034      double freeCurrentAmps,
035      double freeSpeedRadPerSec,
036      int numMotors) {
037    this.nominalVoltageVolts = nominalVoltageVolts;
038    this.stallTorqueNewtonMeters = stallTorqueNewtonMeters * numMotors;
039    this.stallCurrentAmps = stallCurrentAmps * numMotors;
040    this.freeCurrentAmps = freeCurrentAmps * numMotors;
041    this.freeSpeedRadPerSec = freeSpeedRadPerSec;
042
043    this.rOhms = nominalVoltageVolts / this.stallCurrentAmps;
044    this.KvRadPerSecPerVolt =
045        freeSpeedRadPerSec / (nominalVoltageVolts - rOhms * this.freeCurrentAmps);
046    this.KtNMPerAmp = this.stallTorqueNewtonMeters / this.stallCurrentAmps;
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Estimate the current being drawn by this motor.
051   *
052   * @param speedRadiansPerSec The speed of the rotor.
053   * @param voltageInputVolts The input voltage.
054   * @return The estimated current.
055   */
056  public double getCurrent(double speedRadiansPerSec, double voltageInputVolts) {
057    return -1.0 / KvRadPerSecPerVolt / rOhms * speedRadiansPerSec + 1.0 / rOhms * voltageInputVolts;
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Return a gearbox of CIM motors.
062   *
063   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
064   * @return A gearbox of CIM motors.
065   */
066  public static DCMotor getCIM(int numMotors) {
067    return new DCMotor(
068        12, 2.42, 133, 2.7, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(5310), numMotors);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Return a gearbox of 775Pro motors.
073   *
074   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
075   * @return A gearbox of 775Pro motors.
076   */
077  public static DCMotor getVex775Pro(int numMotors) {
078    return new DCMotor(
079        12, 0.71, 134, 0.7, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(18730), numMotors);
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Return a gearbox of NEO motors.
084   *
085   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
086   * @return A gearbox of NEO motors.
087   */
088  public static DCMotor getNEO(int numMotors) {
089    return new DCMotor(
090        12, 2.6, 105, 1.8, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(5676), numMotors);
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Return a gearbox of MiniCIM motors.
095   *
096   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
097   * @return A gearbox of MiniCIM motors.
098   */
099  public static DCMotor getMiniCIM(int numMotors) {
100    return new DCMotor(
101        12, 1.41, 89, 3, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(5840), numMotors);
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Return a gearbox of Bag motors.
106   *
107   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
108   * @return A gearbox of Bag motors.
109   */
110  public static DCMotor getBag(int numMotors) {
111    return new DCMotor(
112        12, 0.43, 53, 1.8, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(13180), numMotors);
113  }
114
115  /**
116   * Return a gearbox of Andymark RS775-125 motors.
117   *
118   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
119   * @return A gearbox of Andymark RS775-125 motors.
120   */
121  public static DCMotor getAndymarkRs775_125(int numMotors) {
122    return new DCMotor(
123        12, 0.28, 18, 1.6, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(5800.0), numMotors);
124  }
125
126  /**
127   * Return a gearbox of Banebots RS775 motors.
128   *
129   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
130   * @return A gearbox of Banebots RS775 motors.
131   */
132  public static DCMotor getBanebotsRs775(int numMotors) {
133    return new DCMotor(
134        12, 0.72, 97, 2.7, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(13050.0), numMotors);
135  }
136
137  /**
138   * Return a gearbox of Andymark 9015 motors.
139   *
140   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
141   * @return A gearbox of Andymark 9015 motors.
142   */
143  public static DCMotor getAndymark9015(int numMotors) {
144    return new DCMotor(
145        12, 0.36, 71, 3.7, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(14270.0), numMotors);
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Return a gearbox of Banebots RS 550 motors.
150   *
151   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
152   * @return A gearbox of Banebots RS 550 motors.
153   */
154  public static DCMotor getBanebotsRs550(int numMotors) {
155    return new DCMotor(
156        12, 0.38, 84, 0.4, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(19000.0), numMotors);
157  }
158
159  /**
160   * Return a gearbox of NEO 550 motors.
161   *
162   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
163   * @return A gearbox of NEO 550 motors.
164   */
165  public static DCMotor getNeo550(int numMotors) {
166    return new DCMotor(
167        12, 0.97, 100, 1.4, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(11000.0), numMotors);
168  }
169
170  /**
171   * Return a gearbox of Falcon 500 motors.
172   *
173   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
174   * @return A gearbox of Falcon 500 motors.
175   */
176  public static DCMotor getFalcon500(int numMotors) {
177    return new DCMotor(
178        12, 4.69, 257, 1.5, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(6380.0), numMotors);
179  }
180
181  /**
182   * Return a gearbox of Romi/TI_RSLK MAX motors.
183   *
184   * @param numMotors Number of motors in the gearbox.
185   * @return A gearbox of Romi/TI_RSLK MAX motors.
186   */
187  public static DCMotor getRomiBuiltIn(int numMotors) {
188    // From https://www.pololu.com/product/1520/specs
189    return new DCMotor(
190        4.5, 0.1765, 1.25, 0.13, Units.rotationsPerMinuteToRadiansPerSecond(150.0), numMotors);
191  }
192}
